title: Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), after consultation with the Minister for
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Occupational Pension Schemes
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Occupational Pension Schemes 

(Funding Standard) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

Amendment of Schedule C to Occupational Pension Schemes (Funding 
Standard) Regulations 1993
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited occupational pension scheme (funding standard) (amendment) regulation 2025 amendment schedule c occupational pension scheme (funding standard) regulation 1993

title: Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), after consultation with the Minister for
heading: 2. Part I of Schedule C (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Occupational
text_raw:
2. Part I of Schedule C (as amended by Regulation 2 of the Occupational 
Pension Schemes (Funding Standard) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 
39 of 2019)) to the Occupational Pension Schemes (Funding Standard) 
Regulations 1993 (S.I. No. 419 of 1993) is amended— 

(a) 

by the substitution of “Any defined benefit scheme established 
under section 9(1)(a) of the Local Government (Planning and 
Development) Act 1983, section 119 of the Planning and 
Development Act 2000 or section 526 of the Planning and 
Development Act 2024” for “Any defined benefit scheme 
established under section 9(1)(a) of the Local Government 
(Planning and Development) Act 1983 or section 119 of the 
Planning and Development Act 2000”, and 

(b) by the substitution of “Any defined benefit scheme established 
under section 11 of the Local Government (Planning and 
Development) Act 1976, section 121 of the Planning and 
Development Act 2000 or section 528 of the Planning and 
Development Act 2024” for “Any defined benefit scheme 
established under section 11 of the Local Government (Planning 
and Development) Act 1976 (No. 20 of 1976) or section 121 of 
the Planning and Development Act 2000”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 25th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and 
Digitalisation consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[343] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 July, 2025. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public 
Service Reform and Digitalisation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 July, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [343]

title: Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), after consultation with the Minister for
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to provide consequential amendments to 
Schedule C to the Occupational Pension Schemes (Funding Standard) 
Regulations 1993 (S.I. No. 419 of 1993) that are required following the 
commencement of Part 17 of the Planning and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 
of 2024) and the corresponding repeal of sections 119 and 121 of the Planning 
and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000). 

 
 
 
 
 [343] 5
